name="zip_code" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="set_parcel_status"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcel_ref" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="new_status" type="tns:parcelStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="set_parcel_statusResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="success" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="parcelStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ARRIVAL_SCAN"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELIVERED"/> name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="set_parcel_status"> <wsdl:part element="tns:set_parcel_status" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="UnknownParcelFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:UnknownParcel" name="UnknownParcelFault"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="set_parcel_statusResponse"> <wsdl:part <wsdl:definitions name="FedPSManagerService" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/romain/fedps/manager" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" type="tns:parcel"/> <xs:element name="submit" type="tns:submit"/> <xs:element name="submitResponse" type="tns:submitResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="submit"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="jobs" type="tns:manager_input"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="manager_input"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="jobs"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="job" type="tns:manager_query"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="manager_query"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customer_name" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="discount" nillable="true" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcel_status" nillable="true" type="tns:parcelStatus"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="kind" type="tns:managerJobKind" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="submitResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="result" type="tns:manager_output"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="manager_output"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="results"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="item" type="tns:jobResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="jobResult"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="customer_result"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customer" type="tns:customer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="customer"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customer_address" type="tns:address"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="permanent_discount" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="temporary_discount" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="address"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="city_name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="country_id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="street_name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="zip_code" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="list_of_customer"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="data"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:parcel"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="parcel"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="depth" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="height" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcel_id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="pickup_date" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="receiver" type="tns:address"/> <xs:element name="sender_name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="sender" type="tns:address"/> <xs:element name="receiver_name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="parcel_status" type="tns:parcelStatus"/> <xs:element name="weight" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="width" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="nb_parcel"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="nb_parcel" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:parcelStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="managerJobKind"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="GET_NB_PARCEL"/> <xs:enumeration value="GET_PARCEL"/> <xs:enumeration value="ADD_DISCOUNT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="parcelStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ARRIVAL_SCAN"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELIVERED"/> <xs:enumeration value="STORAGE"/> <xs:enumeration value="CUSTOMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="IN_TRANSIT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="BadJobFault" type="tns:BadJobFault"/> <xs:complexType name="BadJobFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/romain/fedps/customer" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/romain/fedps/customer"> <xsd:element name="UnknownCustomer" type="tns:UnknownCustomer"/> <xsd:complexType name="UnknownCustomer"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="UnknownCustomerFault"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:UnknownCustomer" name="UnknownCustomerFault"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="BadJobFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:BadJobFault" name="BadJobFault"></wsdl:part> name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ManagerWs"> <wsdl:operation name="submit"> <wsdl:input message="tns:submit" name="submit"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:submitResponse" name="submitResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:BadJobFault" name="BadJobFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="tns:UnknownCustomerFault" con:request.name: get_performance_network
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:man="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/romain/fedps/manager"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <man:submit><!--Optional:--> <jobs> <!--Optional:--> <jobs> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <job kind="GET_NB_PARCEL"> <!--Optional:--> <parcel_status>STORAGE</parcel_status> </job> <job kind="GET_NB_PARCEL"> <!--Optional:--> <parcel_status>IN_TRANSIT</parcel_status> </job> <job kind="GET_NB_PARCEL"> <!--Optional:--> <parcel_status>DELIVERED</parcel_status> </job> </jobs> </jobs> </man:submit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: give_discount
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:man="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/romain/fedps/manager"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <man:submit><!--Optional:--> <jobs> <!--Optional:--> <jobs> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <job kind="ADD_DISCOUNT"> <!--Optional:--> <customer_name>Quincy Whitehead</customer_name> <!--Optional:--> <discount>10</discount> </job> <job kind="ADD_DISCOUNT"> <!--Optional:--> <customer_name>Ima Sosa</customer_name> <!--Optional:--> <discount>10</discount> </job> <job kind="ADD_DISCOUNT"> <!--Optional:--> <customer_name>Natalie Trujillo</customer_name> <!--Optional:--> <discount>10</discount> </job> <job kind="ADD_DISCOUNT"> <!--Optional:--> <customer_name>Keith Pickett</customer_name> <!--Optional:--> <discount>10</discount> </job> </jobs> </jobs> </man:submit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create quote
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/romain/fedps/private/customer"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:create_quote> <parcel_width>10</parcel_width> <parcel_height>20</parcel_height> <parcel_depth>15</parcel_depth> <parcel_weight>10</parcel_weight> <!--Optional:--> <sender_name>Kelly Crane</sender_name> <!--Optional:--> <sender> <city_name>Antibes</city_name> <country_id>Fr</country_id> <street_name>235 bd andre breton</street_name> <zip_code>06600</zip_code> </sender> <!--Optional:--> <receiver_name>Raya Bray</receiver_name> <!--Optional:--> <receiver> <city_name>Cagnes-sur-mer</city_name> <country_id>Fr</country_id> <street_name>rue du general de Gaulle</street_name> <zip_code>06345</zip_code> </receiver> <pickup_date_timestamp>11111111111</pickup_date_timestamp> </cus:create_quote> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
